scripts.build:ui: rm -rf build && cd ../phonebook/ && npm run build && cp -r build ../../../fullstackopen-course-backend/phonebook
scripts.deploy:be: cd ../../../fullstackopen-course-backend/phonebook && git add . && git commit -m svbuild && git push heroku master
scripts.deploy:fe: git add . && git commit -m uibuild && git push
scripts.deploy:full: npm run build:ui && deploy:fe && npm run deploy:be
